doc.name: VariableDelaySwitch
doc.description: A ptolemy.actor.CommunicationAspect actor that applies packet-size and priority dependent delay to incoming packets. Intended to use with RecordTokens only. Assumes record token includes the encapsulated packages with a label "packets" and a TCP header with label "TCPlabel"
doc.author: Ilge Akkaya
doc.property: A Boolean to enable/disable packet-length dependent input delay. The initial default value is true.
A Boolean to enable/disable priority dependent input delay. The initial default value is false.
The channel bandwidth in bits/second. The initial default value is the integer 1000000, signifying 1Mbps.
The size of one data token in bits. The initial default value is an integer with the value 1000.
